description:
Nowadays in the competitive job market it is necessary to speak English. However English is not only the most useful language in the world. It is also one of the easiest languages to learn.

If you want a good job in business, technology, or science, then you must start learning English. And... with a native speaker you will also gain a bit of British accent.

Each lesson of the course begins with a set of clearly stated objectives and an explanation of its place in the overall programme of study. 

There are 16 lessons and numerous self-assessment tests and activities to measure your progress within each lesson.  So, join the course and brush up your English before taking any English test.

Topics Covered

Spelling
Sentence structure and construction
Negatives, questions and prepositions
Tenses
Verbs
Comprehension and composition
title: Everyday English: Brush Up On Your English Grammar
